languages.text: Ни авгуры, ни попытки связаться по воксу не привели ни к чему — первый отряд, исследовавший мостик, бесследно пропал, словно мертвый корабль поглотил людей целиком. Разведчики и их командир Енхо Сон просто исчезли, присоединившись к тысячам сгинувших обитателей "Рожденного в огне".

traits.locale_text: Ни авгуры, ни попытки связаться по воксу не привели ни к чему — первый отряд, исследовавший мостик, бесследно пропал, словно мертвый корабль поглотил людей целиком. Скауты и их командир Енхо Сон просто исчезли, присоединившись к тысячам сгинувших обитателей "Рожденного в огне".

languages.text: Augurs and the vox-system proved equally useless — the first unit, which had been exploring the bridge, had vanished without a trace, almost as if the dead ship had swallowed them whole. The scouts and their commander, Young-ho Sohn, had simply disappeared, joining the thousands of crew members lost aboard the Fireborn.
languages.original_text: Ни авгуры, ни попытки связаться по воксу не привели ни к чему — первый отряд, исследовавший мостик, бесследно пропал, словно мертвый корабль поглотил людей целиком. Разведчики и их командир Енхо Сон просто исчезли, присоединившись к тысячам сгинувших обитателей "Рожденного в огне".

traits.locale_text: Augers and the vox system proved equally useless — the first unit, which had been exploring the bridge, had vanished without a trace, almost as if the dead ship had swallowed them whole. The scouts and their commander, Young-ho Sohn, had simply disappeared, joining the thousands of crew members lost aboard the Fireborn.

Augers and the vox system proved equally useless — the first unit, which had been exploring the bridge, had vanished without a trace, almost as if the dead ship had swallowed them whole. The scouts and their commander, Young-ho Sohn, had simply disappeared, joining the thousands of crew members lost aboard the Fireborn.

Augers and the vox system proved equally useless — the first unit, which had been exploring the bridge, had vanished without a trace, almost as if the dead ship had swallowed them whole. The scouts and their commander, Young-ho Sohn, had simply disappeared, joining the thousands of crew members lost aboard the Fireborn.

Augurs and the vox-system proved equally useless — the first unit, which had been exploring the bridge, had vanished without a trace, almost as if the dead ship had swallowed them whole. The scouts and their commander, Young-ho Sohn, had simply disappeared, joining the thousands of crew members lost aboard the Fireborn.

languages.text: Los augures y el sistema de vocos fueron completamente inútiles. La primera unidad, que había estado explorando el puente, desapareció sin dejar rastro, como si la nave muerta los hubiera devorado. Los exploradores y su comandante, Young-ho Sohn, se habían desvanecido, uniéndose a los miles de tripulantes perdidos con la Nacida del Fuego.
languages.original_text: Augurs and the vox-system proved equally useless — the first unit, which had been exploring the bridge, had vanished without a trace, almost as if the dead ship had swallowed them whole. The scouts and their commander, Young-ho Sohn, had simply disappeared, joining the thousands of crew members lost aboard the Fireborn.

traits.locale_text: Los augures y el sistema de vocos fueron completamente inútiles. La primera unidad, que había estado explorando el puente, desapareció sin dejar rastro, como si la nave muerta los hubiera devorado. Los exploradores y su comandante, Young-ho Sohn, se habían desvanecido, uniéndose a los miles de tripulantes perdidos con la Nacida del Fuego.

languages.text: 负责探索舰桥区域的第一支小队，此刻消失得无影无踪。无论是俄歇矩阵还是音阵系统，都无法联系上这支队伍，仿佛这艘死寂的飞船把所有队员都吞没了一样。那些侦察兵，以及他们的指挥官宋永和，就这样消失不见了，与“烈焰之子”号失踪的成千上万名船员落得了同样的下场。
languages.original_text: Augurs and the vox-system proved equally useless — the first unit, which had been exploring the bridge, had vanished without a trace, almost as if the dead ship had swallowed them whole. The scouts and their commander, Young-ho Sohn, had simply disappeared, joining the thousands of crew members lost aboard the Fireborn.

traits.locale_text: 负责探索舰桥区域的第一支小队，此刻消失得无影无踪。无论是俄歇矩阵还是音阵系统，都无法联系上这支队伍，仿佛这艘死寂的飞船把所有队员都吞没了一样。那些侦察兵，以及他们的指挥官宋永和，就这样消失不见了，与“烈焰之子”号失踪的成千上万名船员落得了同样的下场。

languages.text: スキャナーとヴォクスシステムも同様に役に立たなかった。ブリッジを探索していた最初の部隊はまるで死んだ船に丸ごと飲み込まれたかのように跡形もなく消滅した。偵察兵とその司令、ソン・ヨンホは、ファイアボーンで消えてえいった何千人ものクルーと共に、そのまま姿を消した。
languages.original_text: Augurs and the vox-system proved equally useless — the first unit, which had been exploring the bridge, had vanished without a trace, almost as if the dead ship had swallowed them whole. The scouts and their commander, Young-ho Sohn, had simply disappeared, joining the thousands of crew members lost aboard the Fireborn.

traits.locale_text: スキャナーとヴォクスシステムも同様に役に立たなかった。ブリッジを探索していた最初の部隊はまるで死んだ船に丸ごと飲み込まれたかのように跡形もなく消滅した。偵察兵とその司令、ソン・ヨンホは、ファイアボーンで消えてえいった何千人ものクルーと共に、そのまま姿を消した。

languages.text: Die Auguren und das Vox-System erwiesen sich als ebenso nutzlos – die erste Einheit, die die Brücke erkundet hatte, war spurlos verschwunden, als hätte das tote Schiff sie komplett verschlungen. Die Späher und ihr Commander, Young-ho Sohn, waren einfach weg, wie die Tausenden von Crewmitgliedern an Bord der Fireborn.
languages.original_text: Augurs and the vox-system proved equally useless — the first unit, which had been exploring the bridge, had vanished without a trace, almost as if the dead ship had swallowed them whole. The scouts and their commander, Young-ho Sohn, had simply disappeared, joining the thousands of crew members lost aboard the Fireborn.

traits.locale_text: Die Auguren und das Vox-System erwiesen sich als ebenso nutzlos – die erste Einheit, die die Brücke erkundet hatte, war spurlos verschwunden, als hätte das tote Schiff sie komplett verschlungen. Die Späher und ihr Commander, Young-ho Sohn, waren einfach weg, wie die Tausenden von Crewmitgliedern an Bord der Fireborn.

languages.text: Les scrutateurs et le système-vox s'étaient révélés tout aussi inutiles : la première unité, qui devait explorer la passerelle, avait disparu sans laisser de trace, comme si le vaisseau l'avait avalée. Les éclaireurs et leur commandant, Young-ho Sohn, s'étaient tout simplement volatilisés, à l'instar des milliers de passagers du Flamboyant.
languages.original_text: Augurs and the vox-system proved equally useless — the first unit, which had been exploring the bridge, had vanished without a trace, almost as if the dead ship had swallowed them whole. The scouts and their commander, Young-ho Sohn, had simply disappeared, joining the thousands of crew members lost aboard the Fireborn.

traits.locale_text: Les scrutateurs et le système-vox s'étaient révélés tout aussi inutiles : la première unité, qui devait explorer la passerelle, avait disparu sans laisser de trace, comme si le vaisseau l'avait avalée. Les éclaireurs et leur commandant, Young-ho Sohn, s'étaient tout simplement volatilisés, à l'instar des milliers de passagers du Flamboyant.

languages.text: Alametlerin yanı sıra voks sistemi de işe yaramadı. Köprüyü keşfeden ilk birim, ölü gemi tarafından yutulup yitmişler gibi artlarında hiçbir iz bırakmadan kayıplara karıştı. Keşif erleri ve komutanları Young-ho Sohn, Ateşten'de kaybolan binlerce tayfayla aynı kadarı paylaşıp yok oldu.
languages.original_text: Augurs and the vox-system proved equally useless — the first unit, which had been exploring the bridge, had vanished without a trace, almost as if the dead ship had swallowed them whole. The scouts and their commander, Young-ho Sohn, had simply disappeared, joining the thousands of crew members lost aboard the Fireborn.

traits.locale_text: Alametlerin yanı sıra voks sistemi de işe yaramadı. Köprüyü keşfeden ilk birim, ardında hiçbir iz bırakmadan kayıplara karıştı. Ölü gemi tarafından yutulup yittiler sanki… Keşif birliği ve komutanları Young-ho Sohn, Ateşten'de kaybolan binlerce tayfayla aynı kadarı paylaşıp yok oldu.
